name: Can cans decamp ?
description:
Hi! This the game I made with the help of a (paint-artist) friend for the paint jam 2021... The game is quite short but hope you'll like it. Let me know what you think  :D

(Tell me in comments what is your favorite soup flavor)

It seems that the audio didn't work... :(

Controls:

-Move with WASD

-Die with space

Restart level with  R
